text: Farawo adati, “oh inu mafumu! Inu mulibe mulungu wina amene ine ndimudziwa kupatula ine ndekha. Haman, ndipangireni ine njerwa zadothi ndipo mundimangire nyumba yaitali, yonga nsanja, kuti ndikwerepo kupita kwa Mulungu wa Mose. Ndithudi ine ndili kumuganizira kuti Mose ndi mmodzi mwa anthu abodza.”
